gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Jazz 110, Clippers 109
gameRecap.excerpt: Kenneth Lofton Jr. led the Jazz with season-highs in points (27) and rebounds (nine) along with a career-high eight assists as the Jazz defeated the Clippers, 110-109. Bones Hyland led the Clippers with 20 points, five rebounds, and six assists.
